rows.label: tlk42300071_01_msg0001
rows.name:
My daughter pesters me to read the
story of the creation of Alst, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300071_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Did you think I should
tell her, mo? I've already
told her 700 times, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300071_01_msg0003
rows.name:
She bombards me with questions in the
middle, so it's a huge pain, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300071_01_msg0004
rows.name:
What's a Divine Beast's favorite
food? Will it sink if it sleeps?
Is it a girl? ...I don't know, mo!
